about_the_game:
⭐️ FEATURES ⭐️

🎮4 playable characters. Control one of the four mercenaries of the Golden Force.
🎮Lots of various enemies. Defeat the Demon King, his 5 Generals, and his army of Monsters.
🎮Enough content to keep you engaged for hours. Complete all 22 Stages across the four islands of Muscle Archipelago
🎮2-player co-op mode. Wanna share your adventure with someone? Invite a friend!
🎮Unique platforming, hacking, and slashing. Perform complex combos, slides, crush attacks, and dash attacks. Avoid spiky obstacles, swim, and attack underwater.
🎮 Completionist. Overcome 100% of challenges.
🎮 Just the right vibe. Enjoy colorful retro-style pixel art graphics.
🎮 Cute kittens. (=^.^=)

⭐️ SUMMARY ⭐️

Golden Force is a retro-style, run ‘n gun platformer set on undiscovered fantasy islands of Muscle Archipelago and deep waters, full of deadly creatures, surrounding it. Chop the tentacles of a Kraken-like monster, perform complex combos, slides, and dash attacks.

Defeat mini-bosses and peel the skin off giant and powerful main enemies. Join the intense action to discover many different unlockable areas with funky names like Nacho Island, ruled bySalsa General. Challenge yourself and complete all the stages with the best time, combo count, and with all of the coins in your pocket.

Grab collectibles and throwable items that will aid you in battle. Swim and fight underwater (beware of bloodthirsty fish!), dash over spiky obstacles, and try not to harm any kittens in the process (well, you can and there’s no penalty, but it’s definitely heartbreaking, and we WILL judge you). Finally, overcome the Demon King!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Golden Force is a retro-style action-platformer where you perform complex combos, slides, and dash attacks. Unlock new areas, collect throwable items, fight underwater, avoid spiky obstacles, and master each stage.
